attributes.action: Force by law garages to lower fuel prices with oil price reductions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As petrol forecourts do not drop prices when the oil price goes down, they should be made by law to lower them when the oil price has stayed low for 48 hours or more. They are quick enough to put it up enen when they bought the fuel at a lower price.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
